text: Satyera ahbana tamra'i. Yara tamke chara an'yake ahbana kare, tara taderake kono kichute'i sara deya na [1]; tadera drstanta se byaktira mata, ye tara mukhe pani paumchabe e asaya tara duhata mele dhare panira dike, athaca ta tara mukhe paumchara naya, ara kaphiradera ahbana to kebala bhrastataya nipatita
